short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Warns users of potential phishing websites & protect from wallet drainer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is created for WAGMI ARMY NFT Staker, you have to stake WAGMI ARMY NFT to activate all the feature.

This extension warn you if the site you have visited is in our database of known malicious sites (phishing, scam, etc..), Protect you from attempt to Discord API Token theft attempt, with malicious script live analysis and Crypto transaction checker that helps you avoid crypto scams, assesses the outcome of your transactions before you confirm them using simulations.
